citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility is providing daily enrichment and works to socialize their birds, however a written program of environmental
enhancement for birds was not available for inspection. A written environmental enhancement plan that is approved by
the Attending Veterinarian is required to be available and following the plan helps promote birds' overall wellbeing. Ensure
to work with the Attending Veterinarian to develop an approved environmental enhancement plan.
***Correct by 11/30/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility is providing daily enrichment and works to socialize their birds, however a written program of environmental 
enhancement for birds was not available for inspection. A written environmental enhancement plan that is approved by 
the Attending Veterinarian is required to be available and following the plan helps promote birds' overall wellbeing. Ensure 
to work with the Attending Veterinarian to develop an approved environmental enhancement plan.  
***Correct by 11/30/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
